text: Hi everybody! :blush: I would like to ask if someone would know what is the proper code for HubSpot to calculate an end date property based on an approximate start date property and durations of 3 months, 6 months, and 9 months. Thank you all in advance
Check out calculated properties and the solution mentioned in this community post --> <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM/How-can-I-calculate-a-date-field-based-off-another-date-field/m-p/450667>

Hello,
I recently registered for a development account and was wondering if there is a way to import sample test data into my account. Alternatively, are there any existing sample data accounts that I can connect to? Thank you in advance!
you'll find quite a few examples people have done if you search Google for HubSpot mock data

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!

Hi everyone! I'm not sure if this is the right place to ask but im hoping maybe someone can guide me in the right direction. I want to know if theres any way to track logged calls vs actual dialed calls. I appreciate your help!
